comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of Aug 23, 1915 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F40B13FA3A5C1373... reports on the event, the National Woman's Life Saving League's annual diving and swimming contest, held the day before at Chisholm's bathing pavilion, Sheepshead Bay.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for finding this information swanq. We'll add some of it to the record the next time we update.
